item.title: Could The Moon Make SpaceX The World’s First ‘$100 Trillion’ Company? Elon Musk Thinks So
item.description: Musk’s remarks come as NASA accelerates plans for a sustained U.S. return to the Moon, with SpaceX holding multibillion-dollar lunar contracts.

item.title: Trump Locks In Drug-Price Cuts With Roche, Novartis, Merck — More Big Pharma Deals Coming Next Week
item.description: The deals expand the pricing program to several drugmakers in exchange for temporary tariff relief.

item.title: Trump Locks In Drug-Price Cuts With Roche, Novartis, Merck — More Big Pharma Deals Coming Next Week
item.description: The deals expand the pricing program to several drugmakers in exchange for temporary tariff relief.

item.title: Why TikTok’s US Deal May Be More About Oracle Than You Think — RBC Weighs In
item.description: RBC said Oracle’s TikTok role could support cloud growth via expanded data infrastructure exposure.

item.title: Nvidia, Intel Shares Jump After US Antitrust Agencies Clear $5B Deal That Deepens Their Chip Partnership
item.description: Nvidia announced plans to invest $5 billion in ailing Intel in September at a purchase price of $23.28 per share.
